subject: Order #SSN1554
description_text:
Dear Team.

I would like to know when my order #SSN1554 will be shipped? Because
according your communication and the website it's writed "10th June" for
the lunch of VAM.

Juste a reminder to be careful, because for my last order the address you
used is not the address I wrote, thanks to UPS I changed the address to the
right one.

Thanks for your futur answer.

Bests regards.

conversations.body_text: Hi Romain Roussel,  The shipment of the VAM Pro motor was delayed due to a holdup with the motor housing. The housings have arrived today, and we will be shipping your order between June 16th and 18th. Thank you for your understanding and support!Â
